name: Boxy Pet
description:
I really liked boxes and i actually wanted an box as a pet (for literally no reason.), so i made my dream come true!..... in virutality

pet the box, feed the box (i dont know how) and.... find the 2 secrets :D (theres actually no secrets just some interactions you can do with the box)

yep, this is version 1.0 and theres nothing really new, so im going  to update it sometime!!
